about_the_game: The Watch Dogs: Legion Season Pass includes one major expansion delivered in two episodes including the comeback of Aiden Pearce as a full-playable character. It also includes new content for Watch Dogs: Legion - extra missions, four iconic heroes with unique abilities and a Dedsec car skin. Also includes the Original Watch Dogs Complete edition!

content_descriptors.notes: Players use melee weapons (e.g., pipes, crowbars) and firearms (e.g., pistols, machine guns, assault rifles) to kill enemies; combat can be frenetic, highlighted by realistic gunfire, slow-motion effects, cries of pain, and blood-splatter. Cut scenes depict further instances of violence, The game contains some sexual material.

detailed_description: The Watch Dogs: Legion Season Pass includes one major expansion delivered in two episodes including the comeback of Aiden Pearce as a full-playable character. It also includes new content for Watch Dogs: Legion - extra missions, four iconic heroes with unique abilities and a Dedsec car skin. Also includes the Original Watch Dogs Complete edition!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 or AMD Ryzen 5 1400 290X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650, or AMD Radeon R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 110 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 S, or AMD Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 110 GB available space

short_description: The Season Pass includes one major expansion with two episodes, extra missions, four iconic heroes and more!
